name: Real Plane Truck Car Transport
description:
Get ready to play Real Plane Truck Car Transport game play a real car driver and air plane pilot with this simulator. Now it’s time to fly in the air with cargo plane transport. Car plane transport mania is the most interesting and addictive game for driving and flying lovers. Huge cargo plane, fly like a bird and drive the cars like a skilled driver. Swift drive through highly traffic ridden roads. Car storage of car dealers are full of brand new cars, which needs to be transported to other countries with a cargo plane, that’s where the fun part of the cargo plane simulator car transport comes, pilot the plane to high altitude, no passengers aboard, just the pilot & far away destinations. Game Play Fly cargo plane for transport duty of the automobile companies. This cargo airplane is a beast in the air, when it comes to taking the huge loads to the destination at the thunder speed. We have made this airplane transport a fun to play cargo plane simulator with the addition of hundreds of different cars, extra ordinary plane flying controls and amazing weather conditions. Take the best routes to reach the destination in time. Be in touch with the control tower for the instruction and don’t lose the plane in the tough weather or crash it into other planes and air traffic. All the credit is for the best cargo plane simulator pilot, who reach every destination in time to come up with the best loads of the car transport deliveries truck driver.
The safety and security of the cars, bikes in city transport games is here to play. City airplane parking, carrying cargo in your aircraft flight might be an easy task, but loading, unloading and carrying cars in your city airport plane while you fly is a different task. Don’t let the vehicles get damaged in airplane flight and truck driving cargo truck. The objective of the game is transportation of cars, transportation of bikes which starts with car driving, bike driving loading into the airplane and ultimate flight carrying cars and bikes to the destination. Those who love playing airplane parking, city transport real airplane flight simulators will love the challenge of car transport, bike transport on your cargo plane. Handling an airplane is not easy but let’s take off and fly high in best driving games. Some of tourist have given the contract of transporting cars, transporting bikes internationally so fulfill your job and get yourself accomplish as the real airplane pilot in airplane pilot bike transporter and airplane pilot car transporter game.
Enjoy the wonderful and amazing city and space environment. Ultra HD graphics providing are take you much exciting journey of city airport. Game sounds are as much real you will feel that you are really driving car on city land and also fly cargo plane on skies. If you want to play the real cargo plane transport then this brand new game is definitely enjoyable for you. Immediately download it in your smart phone. This newest game is easily available on play store. Download in your device and enjoy the real fun of fly and driving.
Features:-
- Challenging cargo jet flying missions.
- Stunning sports cars with smooth control.
- Realistic sound and effects.
- Transportation of cars in airplane flight simulator.
- Paid game available on app store.
